description: All work must be your own. Acceptable: Collaborating on understanding, discussing concepts. Not acceptable: Copying, identical submissions.
Students must attend classes regularly. Authorized absences must be documented and reported by sponsoring department.
Students may request excused absences for religious or cultural observances. Must notify instructor in writing and in advance.
Students with disabilities may request accommodations. Contact Disability Access Services (DAS) for formal accommodation process.
Policies vary by assignment type. See individual assignment details for late submission penalties.
Students encouraged to take all in-class exams. Missed exams without excuse = lowest grade dropped. No makeup exams.
Student records are confidential per FERPA. Grades and personal information will not be shared without consent.
